body:
This code

```
	var x, y int = 3, 4
	var f float64 = math.Sqrt((x*x + y*y))
	var z int = (f)
	fmt.Println(x, y, z)
```

produces these errors:

```
prog.go:10: cannot use x * x + y * y (type int) as type float64 in argument to math.Sqrt
prog.go:11: cannot use f (type float64) as type int in assignment
```
